github_actions.ci.yml:
name: CI/CD
on: [push, pull_request]
jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with: { node-version: '18' }
      - run: npm ci
      - run: npx turbo build
      - run: npx turbo test
      - run: npx turbo lint

docker.Dockerfile:
FROM node:18-alpine
WORKDIR /app
COPY package*.json ./
RUN npm ci --only=production
COPY . .
RUN npx turbo build
EXPOSE 3000
CMD ["npm", "start"]
